title: Pineapple Papaya Relish
directions: In a bowl combine all ingredients with salt to taste and let stand at room temperature 1 hour. Relish may be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered.
ingredients: 1/2 cup finely diced red bell pepper
1/2 cup finely diced Maui, Vidalia, or other sweet onion
1 small fresh hot green chili such as a serrano or Thai chili, seeded Â and minced (wear rubber gloves)
